Key Match Events: Axar Patel took a blinder to dismiss Marsh
Kuldeep Yadav bowled out Glenn Maxwell with a googly
Rohit Sharma played his career-best T20 World Cup innings
Pre-Game Insights: Mitch Marsh: Disappointing. It happens in the course of 40 overs, there are a lot of small margins. India were the better team, Rohit is a class player.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma: Satisfying. We know the opposition and the threat they bring. As a team we did well, kept doing the things we needed to do. Gives us good confidence as a team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India reach the semi-final of the T20 World Cup 2024 undefeated
India defeat Australia in their final Super 8 match in St Lucia on Monday, 24 June at St Lucia.
India (205/5) beat Australia (181/7 in 20 overs) by 24 runs.
Others: Arshdeep Singh gets lucky and picks up the wicket of Tim David with a rank full toss
Axar Patel bowls a terrific over under pressure
